description.value:
Allows user to digest most organic and many non-organic materials as long as there is nutrients. Filters out toxins and poisons from ingested food. Best Craftsmanship allows user to survive eating anything organic, although it may not be a pleasant experience.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
